ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: ABA Services
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: ABA Services are created to access various aba atlas space features that are offered by UCSD to its clients.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get Correlation Map
wps:Process.ows:Description: This method will return the URL and load the correlation map interface in the browser

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get structure name by POI
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns Fine/Anatomic structures segmented for the point of interest on map

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get 2D Image at POI
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns 2 Dimensional image based on point of interest on the map

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get genes by POI
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns genes segmented for the given point of interest on the map

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get genes by Structure Name
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns genes segmented for structure name

wps:Process.ows:Title: Atlas Space Transformation from ABA to AGEA, and AGEA to ABA
wps:Process.ows:Description: Finds, transforms and executes the best transformation available from ABA to AGEA, and AGEA to ABA
